name: Peninsula Library System E-Services
description: Free digital resources and e-services for Peninsula Library System cardholders
fullDescription: Peninsula Library System provides e-services and digital resources for cardholders from member libraries throughout San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Shared digital collections
- Ebooks and audiobooks
- Research databases
- Interlibrary loan services
- Digital reference services
howToGetIt:
1. Have a library card from a PLS member library
2. Visit plsinfo.org/e-services
3. Browse available resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content online
